subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, the reigning Australian Open champion, staved off two championship points against Justine Henin in the second set on her way to a 0-6, 7-5, 6-3 victory.
snippet: Serena Williams, the reigning Australian Open champion, staved off two championship points against Justine Henin in the second set on her way to a 0-6, 7-5, 6-3 victory.
